Package uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1

Class PrintUtil

java.lang.Object
uk.co.michaelshields.assignment_1.PrintUtil
public class PrintUtil extends Object
A class that implements a suite of printing utility functions for displaying information is various formats and colours. All the methods are static and therefore this class should not be instantiated using the constructor
Version:
1.0
Author:
M. Shields
